title: Garneck Christmas Toilet Pad Cover Bath Mat Shower Curtain Set Anti-Slip Washroom Carpets Mat Waterproof Shower Curtain Toilet Seat Lid Cover for Home Hotel
features: This shower curtain mat is made of high quality material,features a luxurious, soft pile that soothes tired feet and shields toes from the cold floor.
High absorption toilet mat, moisture is drawn to the surface of the fabric so that it evaporates.
Waterproof shower curtain to keep water from the floor, with sturdy hooks for easy hanging.
Non-slip backing design for safe use. But please keep the floor under the pad dry in case the pad move.
The perfect bath decoration to improve the general outlook of the bathroom. Add more festive touch to your toilet!
description: This decorative mat and shower curtain set is a great choice to keep your bathroom clean and dry. The set includes with a toilet lid cover, toilet contour rug, shower curtain and bath mat. Great pattern will enhance the appearance of your toilet and improve the taste of your life.
